title: The Death of Google Stadia
itunes:title: The Death of Google Stadia
description:
Google announced that Stadia, its cloud-based gaming service, is shutting down in January, 2023. What does that mean for Stadia customers? Are there Stadia customers? And could Google's own history of abandoning products be the root of the problem? 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Google announced that Stadia, its cloud-based gaming service, is shutting down in January, 2023. What does that mean for Stadia customers? Are there Stadia customers? And could Google's own history of abandoning products be the root of the problem? 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Google, Stadia, video games, cloud computing, cloud-based, streaming, Xcloud, Microsoft, Nvidia, GeForce Now, Sony, PlayStation, G-Cluster, OnLive, games as a service, software as a service
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts
